name: MovieHelper
0:
”Alexa ask movie helper to tell me more about the movie Transformers”
”What is the movie SpiderMan about?”
”What good movies are out?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie helper
des:
Movie Helper offers you the choice of finding popular movies, upcoming movies, current movies in theaters, ratings, an overview of a movie, and information on any of your favorite actors. 

Try saying "Tell me more info about the movie Transformers", "What are the ratings for SpiderMan?", "Who is Tom Cruise?", "Popular Movies", "Which movies are coming out?", "What movies are playing right now?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
